verses.content: Aw LALPA chawimawiin hla thar sak unla. Leihnuoia um po pohai, LALPA chawimawiin hla sak ro.
LALPA chawimawia hla sakin, a hming inpâk unla, Ni tin a sandamna thu chu inhriettir ro.
Hnam tin lai chun a ropuizie hril unla, Mi tinrênghai lai chun a thilmak thawhai hril ro.
LALPA chu a ropui a, nasataka inpâk ding a ni sih a, Pathien po po nêka ṭî ding a nih.
Mipuihai pathienhai chu milimhai an ni sih a, LALPA ruok chun vânhai khi a siem a nih.
Chawimawina le ropuina a hmaah an um a, Hrâtna le mawina chu a hmun inthiengah an um.
Mi tina chi tinrênghai, LALPA kuomah pe unla, LALPA kuoma chun ropuina le hrâtna pe ro.
LALPA kuomah a hming ropuina chu pe unla, Thil inhlân ding chawiin a biekin inhuonna sûng tuollaia chun hung ro.
Aw, inthieng mawina inbelin LALPA chu chibai bûk unla, Leihnuoia um po pohai, a hmaa chun inthin ro.
Hnam tin lai chun, “LALPA chu lalah a ṭhung a,” ti ro, Khawvêl khawm hi ân hnîng thei nawna dingin sukdetin a um a; Ama chun thlierbîk nei loin mi tin ro chu rêl a tih.
Vânhai khi lâwmtakin um sienla, hnuoi khawm hi hlimtakin um raw se, Tuisuoriet le a sûnga um po po hi inri hum hum sienla,
Lo le a sûnga um po po hi lâwmtakin um raw se, Chu pha chun ram hnuoia thing po po hi hlimin hla sak an tih.
LALPA hmaa chun ama chu a hung ding a nih, Hnuoi ro rêl dingin a hung ding a ni sih a. Khawvêl hi feltakin ro rêlpêk a ta, Mi tinhai chu a thutakin ro rêlpêk bawk a tih.
